description.en:
The Bosnian language for Beginners II course builds upon foundational skills to develop more advanced language proficiency. Students expand their vocabulary and deepen their understanding of grammar, including past and future tenses, complex sentence structures, grammatical categories and case system. The course emphasizes practical communication, enabling students to engage in conversations on topics like hobbies, work, travel, and expressing opinions. Reading and writing exercises focus on structured texts, such as essays and letters, helping students improve their written communication.
Listening activities feature authentic Bosnian audio materials, enhancing students' comprehension of moderately paced conversations. Cultural lessons provide insights into Bosnian traditions, social contexts, and etiquette, enabling students to communicate more effectively and respectfully. Through role-playing and discussion-based activities, students gain confidence in navigating real-life situations, such as making appointments and handling social interactions. By the end of the course, students will be able to communicate more fluently, understand intermediate-level texts, and confidently express themselves in a variety of contexts.

objectives.en: This Bosnian course is designed to expand language proficiency, enabling students to engage in more complex conversations on topics such as hobbies, work, and travel. Students will build on their existing knowledge by learning advanced vocabulary, refining grammar skills, and improving pronunciation for clearer communication. The course includes exercises in reading and writing, focusing on producing structured texts like short essays and personal letters while enhancing listening comprehension through authentic audio materials. Practical activities will help students navigate real-life situations, from making appointments to discussing opinions, ensuring greater fluency and confidence. In addition, students will deepen their understanding of Bosnian culture, traditions, and social contexts, allowing for more culturally appropriate interactions.
